result.arabic_text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ
result.translation: 7. Yalli malcina baraay bacra ayroy sitta katattay aggirriqqe sinni caacay keenit ruube, tokkel woo baritteé kee woo ayroorah addat sinaamay rabtey qangalaltay tamiirâ laqiibay gorrittey inaaqah tani ceelah ken table.
